DOC.criteria: Subjects must undergo elective shoulder replacement surgery Subjects must ASA class I II Subject able willing sign inform consent Subject 18 year age old time consent Subject pregnant Subject prisoner Subject mental condition may interfere subject 's ability give inform consent willingness fulfill study requirement ( i.e. , severe mental retardation subject understand inform consent process , global dementia , prior stroke interfere Subject 's cognitive ability , senile dementia , Alzheimer 's Disease ) Subject young 18 year age consent Subject pregnant Subject prisoner
